Action.author: harrijk
Action.body: The commit associated with this issue is intended to be a "workaround" until the unit test code is changed to utilize symlinks instead of hard links. Theoretically, this issue could occur on x or p if the Jenkins workers have the cloned repos and /tmp on separate physical disks (or cross file system boundaries).

Action.author: smithbk
Action.body: Closing this because there are no longer any occurrences of os.Link anywhere in fabric-ca code or test cases.
